from math import factorial

while 1:

    n=raw_input()
    
    if(n=="#"):
        break
        
    ans=0
    
    foo=int(n)
    
    for i in range(1,foo+1):
        
        foobar=int(factorial(int(i)))
        
        ans+=pow(i,foobar,10)
        
        ans=ans%10
        
    print(ans)
